info.description: The REST API for GitHub Gist Backend
info.title: GitHub Gist Backend REST API

post.summary: Send reset code for password reset

parameters.description: The Input for sending password reset code
parameters.name: ForgotPasswordInput

get.summary: Register a new user through GitHub

parameters.description: code received from GitHub API after user authorizes application
parameters.name: code

parameters.description: new username to be used for the user
parameters.name: newUsername

parameters.description: Sign in a user
parameters.name: SignInInput

get.summary: Refresh access token with refresh token

parameters.description: User object that needs to be added to the system
parameters.name: SignUpInput

parameters.description: Resend verification email to the user with the given email
parameters.name: ResendVerificationEmailInput

parameters.description: The input required to reset the password
parameters.name: ResetPasswordInput

parameters.description: The username of the user
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: The token required to reset the password
parameters.name: resetToken

parameters.description: The username to check availability
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: Username of the user to be verified
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: Verify the added user object to the database
parameters.name: verificationCode

get.summary: Get the gist by gist id, does not load gist comments

parameters.description: The ID of the gist
parameters.name: gistId

get.summary: Get the comments of a gist

parameters.description: The ID of the gist
parameters.name: gistId

get.summary: Get the stargazers of a gist

parameters.description: The ID of the gist
parameters.name: gistId

get.summary: Check the basic health of api

post.summary: Create a comment on a gist

parameters.description: The Input for creating comment
parameters.name: CreateCommentInput

parameters.description: The Input for updating user metadata
parameters.name: UpdateUserDetailsInput

parameters.description: The username of the user to follow
parameters.name: userToFollow

parameters.description: The Input for creating gist
parameters.name: CreateGistInput

parameters.description: The Input for updating user gist
parameters.name: UpdateGistInput

parameters.description: The ID of the gist to star
parameters.name: gistId

parameters.description: The ID of the gist to un-star
parameters.name: gistId

get.summary: Get the current logged in user details.

parameters.description: The username of the user to unfollow
parameters.name: userToUnfollow

get.summary: Get the publicly visible details of a user, does not load gists

parameters.description: The username to get
parameters.name: username

get.summary: Get the followers of a user

parameters.description: The username of the user to get the followers of
parameters.name: username

get.summary: Get the list of users a user is following

parameters.description: The username of the user to get the following of
parameters.name: username

get.summary: Whether a username follows another username

parameters.description: The username of the follower
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: The username of the user being followed
parameters.name: otherUser

get.summary: Get the publicly visible gist Ids of a user

parameters.description: The username to get gists for
parameters.name: username

get.summary: Get the publicly visible gists of a user, does not load the gist comments

parameters.description: The username to get gists for
parameters.name: username

get.summary: Whether a user has starred a gist

parameters.description: The username of the user to check the starred gist of
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: The ID of the gist to check if it is starred
parameters.name: gistId

get.summary: Get the list of starred gists of a user

parameters.description: The username of the user to get the starred gists of
parameters.name: username
